nodes.text: Raith Sienar, a prominent engineer during the final years of the Galactic Republic, maintained his own personal museum on the planet Coruscant. The museum was located over a kilometer beneath Sienar Systems main plant. The museum contained a hallway displaying holograms of Sienar's previous work, as well as two thousand and twelve exhibits of failed ships and weapons. In 29 BBY, Sienar met with Wilhuff Tarkin, a commander in the Republic Outland Regions Security Force, to discuss Sienar leading a mission to the living planet Zonama Sekot.
Raith Sienar's museum first appeared in Greg Bear's Rogue Planet, a novel released in May 2000.
